title: Watch: Comedy Icons Pull Back The Curtain on Hollywood, Censorship & Politics
description: In this inaugural episode of Murderer's Row, we're joined by Bryan Callen, Jim Breuer, & Nick Di Paolo. The comedians talked about the George Floyd protests, the radicalization of the Left, Bryan's & Nick's journey of becoming Conservative, navigating standup comedy with cancel culture, wokeness in Hollywood, gender ideology, Big Tech censorship, and much more.

title: Bill Maher unloads on progressives and goes there: "Black lives don't seem to matter when they are taken by black lives..."
description:
Yes, at the end of the day, if he votes Bill Maher is going to vote for Joe Biden. It's important to keep that in mind anytime he goes off on how batsh*t crazy progressives have gotten. It's still left-on-left content and you know you enjoy it as much as I do. The fact it's Maher on Joe Rogan's podcast, to quote Excalibur, you GOT to give the people what they want.

The two were discussing a popular topic we discuss here at the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website. How progressive policies have led to an increase in crime in already crime-ridden progressive cities.

title: "Burn in hell": Gold star moms blast Biden's heartless faux empathy, calling one mother by the wrong name
description:
VOTE IN THE LWC 2024 GOP STRAW POLL! CLICK HERE!

Any criticism of Joe Biden, the "imagine the media reaction if he was a Republican" is baked into it. It's almost hackery to bring it up. But I do wonder if two years after a terror attack cost us the lives of thirteen service members those gold star families were still disgusted at a Republican president, how different the media outrage would be.

On August 26, 2021, thirteen American service members were killed in a terrorist attack in Kabul. Critics point to it has the most tragic example of Joe Biden's incompetent and disastrous Afghanistan withdrawal. By "critics," I mean anyone not employed by the White House.

title: Watch: Fauci stammers when even CNN (?!) presents him with evidence his mask mandates did nothing
description:

On one hand, CNN is quoting the New York Times -- two journalisming outlets we're told are legitimate -- about how mask mandates didn't work. On the other hand... they are saying mask mandates didn't work, which while true, doesn't mean Big Tech censors agree.
